description:
Stuck in a beauty rut of topknots, basic eyeliner and blah lip color? We feel you. That’s exactly why we couldn’t be more excited about the slew of makeup and hair inspiration flooding in from New York Fashion Week. Taking cues from the runways, we’ve rounded up an array of ideas for updating your beauty look every day this week. Suddenly excited for the workweek, right? Us too.多久没有改变自己的发饰、眼线、或者唇膏颜色了？审美疲劳否？我们也感觉到了！最近的纽约时装周已经掀起一股新妆容和发型的热风，从中汲取灵感，我们整理出7个棒棒哒小技巧，让你的一周七天，每天都不一样！是不是开始为下一周感到热血了？我们也是~

Monday:混血马尾辫

Part hair into three sections (do the two sides and create a smaller section in the center). Create a French braid down the middle and secure with a tiny elastic. Pull all sections into a low pony and secure with another elastic.把头发分三股（分出两边，中间留小股头发），当中编成法式发辫，用一根小橡皮圈固定。将所有头发汇成一个低马尾，用另一根发圈固定住。

Tuesday:眼线要出线

Jazz up a clean and simple makeup look with a thick stroke of black eyeliner on the lower lash line. Keep lids bare, and accentuate lashes with a thin coat of mascara.画好一个清新干净的妆容，然后在下眼线扫上浓郁一笔，再轻轻刷上睫毛膏！记得眼睑不要画。

Wednesday: 编织的星期三

Tease at the crown to add texture and create subtle lift. Pull hair into a loose pony and braid. Loosely wrap hair into a low bun and pin to secure.不需要借助多余的发饰就可以微妙地Up look. 扎一个松松的马尾，再编成辫子，再低低挽成一个慵懒的发髻，用发夹固定。

Thursday: 刚吃完浆果的嘴

One of the biggest lip colors for spring is a soft berry shade. Go for a raspberry hue and then blot with a tissue. Repeat this a couple more times for a natural, lived-in look that lasts.春季大爱的唇色是淡浆果色，尝试一下略深的覆盆子色，然后用纸巾擦去。重复几次，打造一个持久的，自然唇色。

Friday: 来一发湿发

 

Put it into a deep side part, straighten the ends and use a shine-enhancing pomade to smooth flyways and create the on-trend wet look.头发偏分，发尾拉直，用增加光泽度的润发油将毛发抚平，打造一款超时尚的湿发造型！

     Saturday:眼影新气象     

Go ahead and try an orange eye shadow. Use a cream in the shade on the lid and along the lower lash line. Keep cheeks subtle to avoid detracting from your bold peepers.不如试试新的橘色眼影，只画双眼皮部分和下眼线，腮红要淡，不要混淆妆容的重点。

 Sunday: 亮眼的双手 

Opt for a vibrant-hued nail polish. There is nothing like an electric blue lacquer with a metallic finish to make you feel ready to tackle the busy workweek ahead.选一款亮眼的指甲油色。没有什么比得上金属光泽的铁蓝色，更能让你看上去活力四射，为一周的繁忙工作做好准备！

title: 纽约时装周 7个新春桃花妆
